name: atom-telegram
readme:
# atom-telegram plugin

Write telegram messages in Atom!

Like you can see in the Todo's section, the project is in an very early state. Follow the progress, or even contribute to it.

# Todo's

- [x] Login
- [x] Access chats list
- [x] Show chat history
- [x] Send message
- [ ] Receive notifications
- [ ] Show emoji's in chats
- [ ] Show pictures
- [ ] Send pictures / files

# Feature request

If you have cool ideas for new features please tell me in the issue section on [GitHub](https://github.com/Morosko/atom-telegram/issues)! :wink:

# Contribution

Do the common GitHub contribution flow:

1. Fork repository

2. Make cool changes

3. Create pull request

# Dependencies

- [telegram.link](https://github.com/enricostara/telegram.link) - Telegram Node API

# License
The project is published under the [MIT License](LICENSE.md).
